**[Recall Knowledge - Undead](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 34 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 32 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 29 [Shraen Graveknight](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2132) **Source** [Pathfinder #155: Lord of the Black Sands](/Sources.aspx?ID=33) pg. 52 **Perception** +26; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12) **Languages** [Elven](/Languages.aspx?ID=4), [Necril](/Languages.aspx?ID=20), [Undercommon](/Languages.aspx?ID=11) **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +31, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +27, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +24, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +27 **Str** +4 **Dex** +8 **Con** +4 **Int** +2 **Wis** +3 **Cha** +6 **Items** _+2 [greater resilient](/Equipment.aspx?ID=279) [standard-grade elven chain](/Equipment.aspx?ID=143)_, [Hand Crossbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=69) (10 bolts), [Main-gauche](/Weapons.aspx?ID=32), [Purple Worm Venom](/Equipment.aspx?ID=126) (2), [Rapier](/Weapons.aspx?ID=36) --- **AC** 37 **Fort** +25 **Ref** +27 **Will** +26 +1 status bonus to all saves vs. [magic](/Traits.aspx?ID=103) effects, +2 status bonus to all saves vs. [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106) effects **HP** 295 ([negative healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=42), rejuvenation) **Immunities** [cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=27), [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40), [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [sleep](/Traits.aspx?ID=145), [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38) **Resistances** [positive](/Traits.aspx?ID=128) 30 Sacrilegious Aura 30 feet. 30 feet. When a creature in the aura uses a [positive](/Traits.aspx?ID=128) spell or ability, the graveknight automatically attempts to [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) it, with a +24 counteract modifier.
**[Attack of Opportunity](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=3)** --- **Speed** 30 feet **Melee** _greater frost rapier_ +31 ([Cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=27), [deadly 2d8](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [Disarm](/Traits.aspx?ID=175), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)), **Damage** 3d6+14 piercing plus 1d6 cold **Melee** _greater frost main-gauche_ +31 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=27), [Disarm](/Traits.aspx?ID=175), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [Parry](/Traits.aspx?ID=190), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)), **Damage** 3d4+14 piercing plus 1d6 cold **Melee** fist +29 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=27)), **Damage** 3d6+10 piercing plus 1d6 cold **Ranged** _greater frost hand crossbow_ +31 ([Cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=27), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [range increment 60 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 1](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)), **Damage** 3d6+14 piercing plus 1d6 cold and [purple worm venom](/Equipment.aspx?ID=126) **Divine Innate Spells** DC 36 - **Cantrips (6th)** [Dancing Lights](/Spells.aspx?ID=58) - **2nd** [Faerie Fire](/Spells.aspx?ID=107) (at will) - **4th** [Darkness](/Spells.aspx?ID=59) (at will) **Devastating Blast** ([Arcane](/Traits.aspx?ID=11), [Cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=27), [Evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65)) The graveknight unleashes a 30-foot cone of energy. Creatures in the area take 8d12 cold damage (DC 36 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save). The graveknight can use this ability once every 1d4 rounds. **Graveknight's Curse** ([Arcane](/Traits.aspx?ID=11), [Curse](/Traits.aspx?ID=38), [Necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117)) This curse affects anyone who wears a graveknight's armor for at least 1 hour. **Saving Throw** DC 36 Will save; **Onset** 1 hour; **Stage 1** doomed 1 and cannot remove the armor (1 day); **Stage 2** doomed 2, hampered 10, and cannot remove the armor (1 day); **Stage 3** dies and transforms into the armor's graveknight. **Heart-Seeking Strike** The Shraen graveknight Steps once then Strikes with its rapier. A creature damaged by the attack must attempt a DC 36 Fortitude save. On a failure, the creature takes 4d6 persistent [bleed damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29). On a critical failure, the attack pierces the creature's heart, and the creature dies. **Quick Draw** The Shraen graveknight draws a weapon, then Strikes with it. **Ruinous Weapons** At the time of its creation, a graveknight chooses one of the following energy types that was relevant to its life or death: The Shraen Graveknight's energy type is [cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=27). Any weapon the graveknight wields gains the effects of the [_ greater frost_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=296) and a _+1 [greater striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280)_ weapon rune. **Weapon Master** The graveknight has access to the [critical specialization effects](/Rules.aspx?ID=235) of any weapons it wields.
name: Shraen Graveknight
